description:
STATION PLACE:  Demolition of existing booking hall and construction of ticket office; new canopy with associated bus shelters and information pods and animated sculptures. WELLS TERRACE: Removal of existing canopy, re-arrangement of bus station and construction of new canopy with associated bus shelters 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  FP/PA/100/001-013; FP/PA/200/001 &                         003; FP/PA/500/001; FP/PA/1250/001;                         FP/PA/200/002A & 004A; Materials                         specification 19th January 2001;                         FP/SD/150/001, FP/PA/050/001-007;                         FP/PA/NTS/005-008.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be completed in all respects in accordance with the plans and details submitted and approved, and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior and express permission of the Local Planning Authority. 

 REASON: To ensure the Authority may be fully satisfied that the detail of the proposal to which it gives planning permission is implemented exactly, because of the nature of the development.
